channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo Group Ltd. -- XClarity Administrator (LXCA)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo Group Ltd. -- XClarity Administrator (LXCA)

item.title: CVE-2016-8221|2024-08-06T02:13:21.836Z -- lenovo%20group%20ltd. -- xclarity%20administrator%20%28lxca%29
item.description: Privilege Escalation in Lenovo XClarity Administrator earlier than 1.2.0, if LXCA is used to manage rack switches or chassis with embedded input/output modules (IOMs), certain log files viewable by authenticated users may contain passwords for internal administrative LXCA accounts with temporary passwords that are used internally by LXCA code.
